defines.name: RLAPI
defines.description: We are building the library as a Win32 shared library (.dll)

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_BATCH_DRAWCALLS
defines.description: Default number of batch draw calls (by state changes: mode, texture)

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_BATCH_MAX_TEXTURE_UNITS
defines.description: Maximum number of textures units that can be activated on batch drawing (SetShaderValueTexture())

defines.name: RL_MAX_SHADER_LOCATIONS
defines.description: Maximum number of shader locations supported

defines.name: RL_TEXTURE_MIPMAP_BIAS_RATIO
defines.description: Texture mipmap bias, percentage ratio (custom identifier)

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_POSITION
defines.description: Binded by default to shader location: 0

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_TEXCOORD
defines.description: Binded by default to shader location: 1

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_NORMAL
defines.description: Binded by default to shader location: 2

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_COLOR
defines.description: Binded by default to shader location: 3

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_TANGENT
defines.description: Binded by default to shader location: 4

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_ATTRIB_NAME_TEXCOORD2
defines.description: Binded by default to shader location: 5

defines.name: RL_DEFAULT_SHADER_UNIFORM_NAME_COLOR
defines.description: color diffuse (base tint color, multiplied by texture color)

structs.name: Matrix
structs.description: Matrix, 4x4 components, column major, OpenGL style, right handed

structs.name: rlVertexBuffer
structs.description: Dynamic vertex buffers (position + texcoords + colors + indices arrays)

fields.name: elementCount
fields.description: Number of elements in the buffer (QUADS)

fields.name: texcoords
fields.description: Vertex texture coordinates (UV - 2 components per vertex) (shader-location = 1)

fields.name: indices
fields.description: Vertex indices (in case vertex data comes indexed) (6 indices per quad)

fields.name: vboId
fields.description: OpenGL Vertex Buffer Objects id (4 types of vertex data)

structs.name: rlDrawCall
structs.description: of those state-change happens (this is done in core module)

fields.name: vertexCount
fields.description: Number of vertex of the draw

fields.name: vertexAlignment
fields.description: Number of vertex required for index alignment (LINES, TRIANGLES)

fields.name: textureId
fields.description: Texture id to be used on the draw -> Use to create new draw call if changes

fields.name: currentBuffer
fields.description: Current buffer tracking in case of multi-buffering

fields.name: draws
fields.description: Draw calls array, depends on textureId

fields.name: currentDepth
fields.description: Current depth value for next draw

fields.name: vertexCounter
fields.description: Current active render batch vertex counter (generic, used for all batches)

fields.name: texcoordx
fields.description: Current active texture coordinate (added on glVertex*())

fields.name: texcoordy
fields.description: Current active texture coordinate (added on glVertex*())

fields.name: transform
fields.description: Transform matrix to be used with rlTranslate, rlRotate, rlScale

fields.name: transformRequired
fields.description: Require transform matrix application to current draw-call vertex (if required)

fields.name: defaultTextureId
fields.description: Default texture used on shapes/poly drawing (required by shader)

fields.name: activeTextureId
fields.description: Active texture ids to be enabled on batch drawing (0 active by default)

fields.name: defaultVShaderId
fields.description: Default vertex shader id (used by default shader program)

fields.name: defaultFShaderId
fields.description: Default fragment shader id (used by default shader program)

fields.name: defaultShaderId
fields.description: Default shader program id, supports vertex color and diffuse texture

fields.name: defaultShaderLocs
fields.description: Default shader locations pointer to be used on rendering

fields.name: currentShaderId
fields.description: Current shader id to be used on rendering (by default, defaultShaderId)

fields.name: currentShaderLocs
fields.description: Current shader locations pointer to be used on rendering (by default, defaultShaderLocs)

fields.name: projectionStereo
fields.description: VR stereo rendering eyes projection matrices

fields.name: viewOffsetStereo
fields.description: VR stereo rendering eyes view offset matrices

fields.name: glCustomBlendModeModified
fields.description: Custom blending factor and equation modification status

values.name: RL_LOG_TRACE
values.description: Trace logging, intended for internal use only

values.name: RL_LOG_DEBUG
values.description: Debug logging, used for internal debugging, it should be disabled on release builds

values.name: RL_LOG_INFO
values.description: Info logging, used for program execution info

values.name: RL_LOG_WARNING
values.description: Warning logging, used on recoverable failures

values.name: RL_LOG_ERROR
values.description: Error logging, used on unrecoverable failures

values.name: RL_LOG_FATAL
values.description: Fatal logging, used to abort program: exit(EXIT_FAILURE)

values.name: RL_BLEND_CUSTOM
values.description: Blend textures using custom src/dst factors (use rlSetBlendFactors())

values.name: RL_BLEND_CUSTOM_SEPARATE
values.description: Blend textures using custom src/dst factors (use rlSetBlendFactorsSeparate())

values.name: RL_SHADER_LOC_MATRIX_VIEW
values.description: Shader location: matrix uniform: view (camera transform)

values.name: RL_SHADER_LOC_COLOR_DIFFUSE
values.description: Shader location: vector uniform: diffuse color

values.name: RL_SHADER_LOC_COLOR_SPECULAR
values.description: Shader location: vector uniform: specular color

values.name: RL_SHADER_LOC_COLOR_AMBIENT
values.description: Shader location: vector uniform: ambient color

values.name: RL_SHADER_LOC_MAP_ALBEDO
values.description: Shader location: sampler2d texture: albedo (same as: RL_SHADER_LOC_MAP_DIFFUSE)

values.name: RL_SHADER_LOC_MAP_METALNESS
values.description: Shader location: sampler2d texture: metalness (same as: RL_SHADER_LOC_MAP_SPECULAR)

values.name: RL_ATTACHMENT_CUBEMAP_POSITIVE_X
values.description: Framebuffer texture attachment type: cubemap, +X side

values.name: RL_ATTACHMENT_CUBEMAP_NEGATIVE_X
values.description: Framebuffer texture attachment type: cubemap, -X side

values.name: RL_ATTACHMENT_CUBEMAP_POSITIVE_Y
values.description: Framebuffer texture attachment type: cubemap, +Y side

values.name: RL_ATTACHMENT_CUBEMAP_NEGATIVE_Y
values.description: Framebuffer texture attachment type: cubemap, -Y side

values.name: RL_ATTACHMENT_CUBEMAP_POSITIVE_Z
values.description: Framebuffer texture attachment type: cubemap, +Z side

values.name: RL_ATTACHMENT_CUBEMAP_NEGATIVE_Z
values.description: Framebuffer texture attachment type: cubemap, -Z side

callbacks.name: rlglLoadProc
callbacks.description: OpenGL extension functions loader signature (same as GLADloadproc)

functions.name: rlMatrixMode
functions.description: Choose the current matrix to be transformed

functions.name: rlPushMatrix
functions.description: Push the current matrix to stack

functions.name: rlPopMatrix
functions.description: Pop lattest inserted matrix from stack

functions.name: rlLoadIdentity
functions.description: Reset current matrix to identity matrix

functions.name: rlTranslatef
functions.description: Multiply the current matrix by a translation matrix

functions.name: rlRotatef
functions.description: Multiply the current matrix by a rotation matrix

functions.name: rlScalef
functions.description: Multiply the current matrix by a scaling matrix

functions.name: rlMultMatrixf
functions.description: Multiply the current matrix by another matrix

functions.name: rlBegin
functions.description: Initialize drawing mode (how to organize vertex)

functions.name: rlActiveTextureSlot
functions.description: Select and active a texture slot

functions.name: rlDisableFramebuffer
functions.description: Disable render texture (fbo), return to default framebuffer

functions.name: rlIsStereoRenderEnabled
functions.description: Check if stereo render is enabled

functions.name: rlClearScreenBuffers
functions.description: Clear used screen buffers (color and depth)

functions.name: rlCheckErrors
functions.description: Check and log OpenGL error codes

functions.name: rlSetBlendFactors
functions.description: Set blending mode factor and equation (using OpenGL factors)

functions.name: rlSetBlendFactorsSeparate
functions.description: Set blending mode factors and equations separately (using OpenGL factors)

functions.name: rlSetRenderBatchActive
functions.description: Set the active render batch for rlgl (NULL for default internal)

functions.name: rlDrawRenderBatchActive
functions.description: Update and draw internal render batch

functions.name: rlCheckRenderBatchLimit
functions.description: Check internal buffer overflow for a given number of vertex

functions.name: rlSetTexture
functions.description: Set current texture for render batch and check buffers limits

functions.name: rlLoadVertexBufferElement
functions.description: Load a new attributes element buffer

functions.name: rlUpdateVertexBuffer
functions.description: Update GPU buffer with new data

functions.name: rlUpdateVertexBufferElements
functions.description: Update vertex buffer elements with new data

functions.name: rlLoadTextureDepth
functions.description: Load depth texture/renderbuffer (to be attached to fbo)

functions.name: rlUpdateTexture
functions.description: Update GPU texture with new data

functions.name: rlGetPixelFormatName
functions.description: Get name string for pixel format

functions.name: rlGenTextureMipmaps
functions.description: Generate mipmap data for selected texture

functions.name: rlCompileShader
functions.description: Compile custom shader and return shader id (type: RL_VERTEX_SHADER, RL_FRAGMENT_SHADER, RL_COMPUTE_SHADER)

functions.name: rlSetShader
functions.description: Set shader currently active (id and locations)

functions.name: rlComputeShaderDispatch
functions.description: Dispatch compute shader (equivalent to *draw* for graphics pilepine)

functions.name: rlGetMatrixProjectionStereo
functions.description: Get internal projection matrix for stereo render (selected eye)

functions.name: rlGetMatrixViewOffsetStereo
functions.description: Get internal view offset matrix for stereo render (selected eye)

functions.name: rlSetMatrixProjection
functions.description: Set a custom projection matrix (replaces internal projection matrix)

functions.name: rlSetMatrixModelview
functions.description: Set a custom modelview matrix (replaces internal modelview matrix)

functions.name: rlSetMatrixProjectionStereo
functions.description: Set eyes projection matrices for stereo rendering

functions.name: rlSetMatrixViewOffsetStereo
functions.description: Set eyes view offsets matrices for stereo rendering
